Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it does not handle the case when a is equal to b but not equal to c. In this case, it should return c, but it returns a + b + c. Generated Test cases 2 to 14 (13/14) should pass the buggy code, while all test cases should pass the perfect code. Test case 1 has been modified to ensure that the buggy code fails it.
